detail_desc: Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, covered elastication at the waist, short legs and a lined front.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Fleece gloves with ribbing containing glittery threads at the cuffs. Unlined.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0241602.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, closely-knit cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

V-neck playsuit in an airy weave with a wrapover front, long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Opening down the back with a button at the back of the neck, and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Hair scrunchies in elasticated fabric.
Long-sleeved jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved tops in soft pointelle with a contrasting colour lace trim around the neckline and sleeves.

Tunic in an airy weave with a rounded stand-up collar and a V-neck opening at the front. Buttons down the front, a yoke with gathers at the back to create a relaxed fit, long sleeves with rounded, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Joggers in soft cotton corduroy in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck that has elasticated gathers at the front and short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim.

V-neck blouse in a lightly crêped viscose weave with buttons down the front, a yoke and gentle gathers at the shoulders. Long sleeves with gathered cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, text motif on the front and colourful stripes down the sleeves. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and discreet side pockets. Lined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Sports tights with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees, and reflective details.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit hats in a cotton blend with roll edges.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Slippers in soft suede with a hook and loop tab over the foot. Patterned fabric linings and soft suede soles.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and an imitation suede flap with a fastener. One inner compartment and one outer compartment with a zip. Lined. Height 18 cm. Width 23 cm.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. T-shirt and shorts set in soft, printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and diagonal side pockets.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Jeans in superstretch denim with a seam detail at the top and back pockets. High waist with a cut-out section front and back, zip fly with two buttons at the top and slim legs.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.
Wide, calf-length, double-breasted coat in twill made from an Italian wool blend. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal front pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, wide blouse in viscose crêpe with a lace Peter Pan collar and sewn-on tie, opening with a button at the back of the neck, gathered yoke and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Glittery trainers with an imitation suede tongue, an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Fully lined, backless swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a twisted detail at the front and a fastener at the back. Cut-out section at the waist.
Maxi dress in a pleated weave. Narrow cut at the top, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Unlined.

Ankle-length, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with appliqués at the top and hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and flounced trim. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Knee-length cargo shorts in washed, stretch twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Side pockets, back pockets and zipped leg pockets.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and mesh sections. Seamless.
Suit trousers in a textured linen and cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdy, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and an open chest pocket.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a motif. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Short wrap dress in woven fabric with short, wide sleeves and a V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounced trim. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and detachable, soft tie belt. Fake fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Warm-lined boots in fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Faux fur linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Double-breasted pea coat in a felted wool blend with wide notch lapels, embossed metal buttons, welt side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Satin top with lace and studs at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and gently dropped shoulders.

Set with a top and pair of puff pants in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trim at the hem. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and a frill trim around the hems.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Tunic in an airy cotton weave with embroidery, an opening and twisted ties with tassels at the top, short dolman sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorter jumper in chunky, rib-knit cotton with a small stand-up collar, raglan sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless playsuit in lace with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats, a concealed zip in one side, and wide legs. Jersey lining.
Clip earrings in hammered metal with large, tear-shaped plastic beads. Length 8.5 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Jumper in a fine-knit, marled cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, an open chest pocket and roll edges.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in organic cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Vest top in airy slub linen jersey with a round neckline.
Shorter top in textured jersey with a V-neck with elasticated gathers at the front, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a frill trim at the hem.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim with a regular waist. Zip fly and button, low crotch and straight, slightly wider legs.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length skirt in sturdy, bonded, patterned fabric made from recycled polyester containing organic silk and viscose. Concealed zip in the side and an asymmetric hem with a wide, flared flounce. Unlined.
Long, off the shoulder jumper in a soft mohair-blend knit with wide ribbing at the top and long raglan sleeves.

Soft, padded nursing bras in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with opening, jersey-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace hem. No fasteners.
Straight-style, fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with an embroidered motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a printed jersey T-shirt and pair of stretch denim jeans. Slim-fit jeans with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
